job_history.work_description: Supervise all units in the Finance Department including revenue, budget, purchasing, general ledger accounting, accounts payable and receivable, payroll and utility billing. Direct the treasury functions for the City and South County Regional Wastewater Authority (SCRWA), including the preparation and review of periodic investment reports and the oversight of the City's investment portfolio.
Management of fiscal duties, provision of complex staff assistance to esponsible for all SEC and external financial reporting for Calpine Corporation.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in finance department supervision, including revenue, budget, purchasing, general ledger accounting, and payroll, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Directed the treasury functions for the City and South County Regional Wastewater Authority (SCRWA), including the preparation and review of periodic investment reports and the oversight of the City's investment portfolio, showing strong proficiency and extensive experience.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Handled all aspects of accounting including general ledger accounting, accounts payable and receivable, payroll, and external financial reporting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised all units in the Finance Department, including revenue, budget, purchasing, general ledger accounting, accounts payable and receivable, payroll, and utility billing, showing strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Investment Management
skills.explanation: Oversight of the City's investment portfolio, including the preparation and review of periodic investment reports, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Auditing
skills.explanation: Experience as a Senior Auditor, although the client base is not specified, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Responsible for all SEC and external financial reporting for Calpine Corporation, suggesting strong proficiency.
